headline: Coinbase Cybersecurity Push And Valuation Gap Put Risk Trade Off In Focus
summary: Coinbase Global (NasdaqGS:COIN) has expanded its threat intelligence sharing initiative with Crypto ISAC. The company is enabling automated, continuous sharing of high confidence cyber threat data across participating crypto firms. The move is aimed at strengthening collective defense across the crypto sector and connected financial infrastructure. For you as an investor watching the crypto sector, this development sits at the intersection of cybersecurity and digital asset infrastructure...

headline: Coinbase Global Inc. (COIN) Faces Near-Term Headwinds Despite Platform Expansion
summary: Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) is one of the stocks with huge growth potential, according to the media. On January 23, Compass Point lowered its price target on Coinbase Global (NASDAQ:COIN) to $190 from $230 while keeping a Sell rating, citing expected Q4 revenue miss of about 4% across trading and subscription segments, concerns over declining […]
